text: Thompson Run is a tributary of the Beaver River in western Pennsylvania. The stream rises in north-central Beaver County and flows west entering the Beaver River at Homewood, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 12.5% agricultural, 54% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Beaver River Category:Rivers of Beaver County, Pennsylvania
title: Thompson Run (Beaver River tributary)
